name: Lost Princess: City
description:
Story:


Play this FPS walking simulation where mission is to collect hidden items to get achievements. Princess are again lost in big city and player mission is to find princess to finish journey. Game contains also several other collectable items which gives player steam achievements So explorer big open city and other areas find all hidden objects

Features:

- lot of collectable items which gives steam achievements
- Relax andbig city with lof of different items
